name: Proof of Concept - Playdate
description: I just wanted to see if i could make something for the Playdate. Anything. Even though this is an extremely short game (only 3 levels), I wanted to see if i could figure out Pulp and Pulp Script. It is very basic, since i don't know what i'm doing yet. Ha.  I did plenty of things wrong with this, but it was a learning experience. Hopefully, I can make a second game that is a true game.
